019package org.jgrapes.util;
020
021import java.io.IOException;
022import java.nio.file.FileSystem;
023import java.nio.file.Files;
024import java.nio.file.NoSuchFileException;
025import java.nio.file.Path;
026import static java.nio.file.StandardWatchEventKinds.*;
027import java.nio.file.WatchKey;
028import java.nio.file.WatchService;
029import java.time.Instant;
030import java.util.ArrayList;
031import java.util.Collections;
032import java.util.List;
033import java.util.Map;
034import java.util.Optional;
035import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
036import java.util.logging.Level;
037import java.util.logging.Logger;
038import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
039import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
040import org.jgrapes.core.Event;
041import org.jgrapes.core.Manager;
042import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
043import org.jgrapes.util.events.FileChanged;
044import org.jgrapes.util.events.WatchFile;
045
046/**
047 * A component that watches paths in the file system for changes. 
048 */
049@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
050public class FileSystemWatcher extends Component {
051
052    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.FieldNamingConventions")
053    protected static final Logger logger
054        = Logger.getLogger(FileSystemWatcher.class.getName());
055
056    private final Map<FileSystem, WatchServiceInfo> watchServices
057        = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
058    private final Map<Path, WatchInfo> watched = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
059
060    /**
061     * Creates a new component base with its channel set to
062     * itself.
063     */
064    public FileSystemWatcher() {
065        super();
066    }
067
068    /**
069     * Creates a new component base with its channel set to the given 
070     * channel. As a special case {@link Channel#SELF} can be
071     * passed to the constructor to make the component use itself
072     * as channel. The special value is necessary as you 
073     * obviously cannot pass an object to be constructed to its 
074     * constructor.
075     *
076     * @param componentChannel the channel that the component's
077     * handlers listen on by default and that 
078     * {@link Manager#fire(Event, Channel...)} sends the event to
079     */
080    public FileSystemWatcher(Channel componentChannel) {
081        super(componentChannel);
082    }
083
084    /**
085     * Register a path for being watched.
086     *
087     * @param event the event
088     * @throws IOException if an I/O exception occurs
089     */
090    @Handler
091    public void onWatchFile(WatchFile event) throws IOException {
092        final Path path = event.path().toAbsolutePath();
093        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.CloseResource")
094        WatchServiceInfo serviceInfo = watchServices.get(path.getFileSystem());
095        if (serviceInfo == null) {
096            try {
097                serviceInfo = new WatchServiceInfo(path.getFileSystem());
098                watchServices.put(path.getFileSystem(), serviceInfo);
099            } catch (IOException e) {
100                logger.log(Level.WARNING, e,
101                    () -> "Cannot get watch service: " + e.getMessage());
102                return;
103            }
104        }
105        Path toWatch = path.getParent().toFile().getCanonicalFile().toPath();
106        synchronized (watched) {
107            if (!watched.containsKey(toWatch)) {
108                try {
109                    watched.put(toWatch, new WatchInfo(
110                        toWatch.register(serviceInfo.watchService,
111                            ENTRY_CREATE, ENTRY_DELETE, ENTRY_MODIFY)));
112                } catch (IOException e) {
113                    logger.log(Level.WARNING, e,
114                        () -> "Cannot watch: " + e.getMessage());
115                }
116            }
117        }
118        watched.get(toWatch).watched.add(new WatchedInfo(path));
119    }
120
121    private void handleWatchEvent(Path directory) {
122        Optional.ofNullable(watched.get(directory)).map(wi -> wi.watched)
123            .orElse(Collections.emptyList()).forEach(wi -> {
124                FileChanged.Kind change = checkForChange(wi);
125                if (change != null) {
126                    fire(new FileChanged(wi.path, change));
127                }
128            });
129    }
130
131    /**
132     * Watching file in directory.
133     * @param changes the changes
134     * @param path the path
135     * @param watched the wi
136     */
137    private FileChanged.Kind checkForChange(WatchedInfo watched) {
138        Instant prevModified = watched.lastModified;
139        watched.updateLastModified();
140        if (prevModified == null) {
141            // Check if created
142            if (watched.lastModified != null) {
143                return FileChanged.Kind.CREATED;
144            }
145            return null;
146        }
147        // File has existed
148        if (watched.lastModified == null) {
149            // Now deleted
150            return FileChanged.Kind.DELETED;
151        }
152        // Check if modified
153        if (!prevModified.equals(watched.lastModified)) {
154            return FileChanged.Kind.MODIFIED;
155        }
156        return null;
157    }
158
159    /**
160     * The Class WatchServiceInfo.
161     */
162    private class WatchServiceInfo {
163        private final WatchService watchService;
164        private final Thread watcher;
165
166        private WatchServiceInfo(FileSystem fileSystem) throws IOException {
167            watchService = fileSystem.newWatchService();
168            watcher = new Thread(() -> {
169                while (true) {
170                    try {
171                        WatchKey key = watchService.take();
172                        if (!(key.watchable() instanceof Path)) {
173                            continue;
174                        }
175                        handleWatchEvent((Path) key.watchable());
176                        key.reset();
177                    } catch (InterruptedException e) {
178                        logger.log(Level.WARNING, e,
179                            () -> "No WatchKey: " + e.getMessage());
180                    }
181                }
182            });
183            watcher.setDaemon(true);
184            watcher.setName(fileSystem.toString() + " watcher");
185            watcher.start();
186        }
187
188    }
189
190    /**
191     * The Class WatchInfo.
192     */
193    private static class WatchInfo {
194        @SuppressWarnings("unused")
195        private final WatchKey watchKey;
196        private final List<WatchedInfo> watched;
197
198        private WatchInfo(WatchKey watchKey) {
199            this.watchKey = watchKey;
200            watched = Collections.synchronizedList(new ArrayList<>());
201        }
202
203    }
204
205    /**
206     * The Class WatchedInfo.
207     */
208    private static class WatchedInfo {
209        private final Path path;
210        private Instant lastModified;
211
212        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseVarargs")
213        private WatchedInfo(Path path) {
214            this.path = path;
215            updateLastModified();
216        }
217
218        private void updateLastModified() {
219            try {
220                if (!Files.exists(path)) {
221                    lastModified = null;
222                    return;
223                }
224                lastModified = Files.getLastModifiedTime(path).toInstant();
225            } catch (NoSuchFileException e) {
226                // There's a race condition here.
227                lastModified = null;
228            } catch (IOException e) {
229                logger.log(Level.WARNING, e,
230                    () -> "Cannot get modified time: " + e.getMessage());
231            }
232        }
233    }
234}
